revised_title: Zoological and Petrological Discoveries in Kerguelen's Land and Rodriguez
tldr: The author, C. O. Waterhouse, provides an account of the zoological, botanical, and petrological collections made in Kerguelen's Land and Rodriguez during the Transit of Venus Expeditions in 1874-75. The article focuses on the Coleoptera species collected from Rodriguez, detailing the specimens, their distribution, and descriptions of new species and genera. Additionally, the author discusses the petrological and botanical findings from the islands.
